question: Analyze the social media presence and engagement of companies in the technology sector based on various platforms.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies within the technology industry to gather social media data.
Collect social media engagement metrics from Facebook for the identified technology companies.
Gather social media engagement metrics from Instagram for the same companies.
Collect Twitter engagement and activity metrics from the identified companies.
Compile YouTube presence metrics for the technology sector companies to assess video engagement and reach.
